issue.title: [Final Event Feature] Proposal to replace CommsClient API with ROS based API

content.raw: It is still unclear to me how the solution container has to be build \(a how-to for this would be nice\). So, if this proposal makes it easier, I would agree to take some additional effort to change the communication. But before this decision is made I would like to get a better understand what will has to be changed. \(Maybe a short example would help.\)
content.html: It is still unclear to me how the solution container has to be build (a how-to for this would be nice). So, if this proposal makes it easier, I would agree to take some additional effort to change the communication. But before this decision is made I would like to get a better understand what will has to be changed. (Maybe a short example would help.)
